title: Rescuing the Unpoisoned: Efficient Defense against Knowledge Corruption Attacks on RAG Systems
description: A resource-efficient defense mechanism against the knowledge corruption attacks on RAG systems by filtering out potentially adversarial documents.

title: Bridging Models and Agents: Protocol Architectures and Security in MCP & A2A
description: A study on protocol architectures and security in Model Control Protocol and Agent-to-Agent communication.

title: Trends in Attacks and Defenses against Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) Systems
description: An analysis of security vulnerabilities in RAG systems and emerging defense mechanisms.
